plot: A young bride wonders at her husband's frequent absences. Suspicion mounts. What can the young man find more alluring than she, herself?
title: The Smoker
plot_es: A young bride wonders at her husband's frequent absences. Suspicion mounts. What can the young man find more alluring than she, herself?
plot_en: A young bride wonders at her husband's frequent absences. Suspicion mounts. What can the young man find more alluring than she, herself?
